A B E G H I M O R S T W

A

assertNear(double, double) - Static method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBedAssert
Asserts that the two values are "sufficiently close".

B

battleFieldSpec - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The battlefield specification, which is the default.

E

engine - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The Robocode game engine instance used for this test.
errors - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The number of errors generated during this battle so far.

G

getExpectedErrors() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Specifies how many errors you expect this battle to generate.
getInitialPositions() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Returns a comma or space separated list like: x1,y1,heading1, x2,y2,heading2, which are the coordinates and heading of robot #1 and #2.
getNumRounds() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Provides the number of rounds in this battle.
getRobotNames() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Must return a comma-separated list of fully qualified robot names to be in this battle.

H

height - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The height of the battle field, initialized at the beginning of the battle.

I

isDeterministic() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Defaults to true, indicating that the battle is deterministic and robots will always start in the same position each time.
isDumpingErrors - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
True to specify that error messages should be printed out.
isDumpingMessages - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
True to specify that Robot messages should be printed out.
isDumpingOutput - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
True to specify that Robot output should be printed out.
isDumpingPositions - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
True to specify that the position during each turn should be printed out.
isDumpingTurns - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
True to specify that each turn should be printed out.

M

messages - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The number of messages generated during this battle so far.

O

onBattleError(BattleErrorEvent) - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Keep track of the number of errors.
onBattleMessage(BattleMessageEvent) - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Keep track of the number of messages.
onTurnEnded(TurnEndedEvent) - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Called after each turn, and implements basic logging information about the turn number and the position of each robot.

R

robocode.control.testing - package robocode.control.testing
Provides a harness for JUnit testing.
RobotTestBed - Class in robocode.control.testing
RobotTestBed provides a superclass that can be extended in order to implement JUnit tests for Robocode robots.
RobotTestBed() - Constructor for class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Create an instance of RobotTestBed which provides default implementations for some (not all) of the IBattleListener methods.
RobotTestBedAssert - Class in robocode.control.testing
Provides some additional Assert methods for use in Robocode.
RobotTestBedAssert() - Constructor for class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBedAssert
 
run() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Runs a test, invoking the runSetup method before the battle starts and the runTearDown method after the battle ends.
runSetup() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Invoked before the test battle begins.
runTeardown() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
Invoked after the test battle ends.

S

setup() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The setup method run before each test, which sets up the listener on the engine for testing.

T

tearDown() - Method in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
After each test is run, the listener is removed.

W

width - Variable in class robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
The width of the battle field, initialized at the beginning of the battle.
